targets.expr:
sum by(status_code, pattern) (rate(darkstat_http_by_pattern_duration_seconds_hist_sum{environment="production"}[10m])) /
sum by(status_code, pattern) (rate(darkstat_http_by_pattern_duration_seconds_hist_count{environment="production"}[10m]))

sum by(status_code, pattern) (rate(darkstat_http_by_pattern_duration_seconds_hist_sum{pattern!="index.html"}[10m])) /
sum by(status_code, pattern) (rate(darkstat_http_by_pattern_duration_seconds_hist_count{pattern!="index.html"}[10m]))

panels.title: Load By Status Code and Env
Http Body Size Sum Load By pattern

targets.expr:
sum by(status_code, pattern) (increase(darkstat_http_by_pattern_body_size_bytes_hist_sum{environment="production"}[10m])) /
sum by(status_code, pattern) (increase(darkstat_http_by_pattern_body_size_bytes_hist_count{environment="production"}[10m]))

panels.title: Http Average Body Size By pattern
